title: The Century of cinema
brief_description: ‘The Century of cinema’ is a series of highly personal documentaries made by leading film directors throughout the world. It was executive produced by Colin MacCabe and Bob Last for BFI TV and Channel Four Television in association with a world-wide alliance of broadcasters and distributors.
